medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began during the previous month with a decline in visual acuity; right eye visual acuity was 20/50, and left eye could count fingers only. The condition showed gradual worsening, leading to the patient seeking medical attention.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Polycythemia vera with myelofibrosis and splenomegaly; patient was taking ruxolitinib.
